channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: These solemn photos show what it's like to come home after a formidable flood
item.description: In this era of climate change, dramatic floods are everywhere. Photographer Gideon Mendel has made it his mission to show the aftermath. training his camera on flood people flooded out of their homes.
item.content:encoded:
In this era of climate change, dramatic floods are everywhere. Photographer Gideon Mendel has made it his mission to show the aftermath. training his camera on flood people flooded out of their homes.

(Image credit: Gideon Mendel)
item.dc:creator: Diane Cole

item.title: Chinese swimmers at Paris Olympics deny doping accusations as diplomatic row grows
item.description: Chinese athletes say they compete "clean" despite positive drug tests in 2021 that were kept secret. Diplomatic tensions over the case continue to escalate as U.S. officials push for reform.
item.content:encoded:
Chinese athletes say they compete "clean" despite positive drug tests in 2021 that were kept secret. Diplomatic tensions over the case continue to escalate as U.S. officials push for reform.

(Image credit: Martin Meissner)
item.dc:creator: Brian Mann

item.title: Firefighters are struggling to contain a massive fire blazing in northern California
item.description: 350 thousand acres are burning in Northern California, an area bigger than the city of Los Angeles. We'll hear from residents threatened by the Park Fire.
item.content:encoded: 350 thousand acres are burning in Northern California, an area bigger than the city of Los Angeles. We'll hear from residents threatened by the Park Fire.
item.dc:creator: Katherine Monahan

item.title: Airstrike kills 12 children in the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights
item.description: A rocket strike in the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights killed 12 children on a soccer field yesterday. Israel blames the Lebanese militant group Hezbollah, which denies responsibility for the attack.
item.content:encoded: A rocket strike in the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights killed 12 children on a soccer field yesterday. Israel blames the Lebanese militant group Hezbollah, which denies responsibility for the attack.
item.dc:creator: Kat Lonsdorf

item.title: Longtime Michigan Senator Debbie Stabenow's seat is up for grabs
item.description: Early voting started in Michigan's primaries this weekend. A major question: Who will become the party nominees for the seat of retiring Democratic Sen. Debbie Stabenow?
item.content:encoded: Early voting started in Michigan's primaries this weekend. A major question: Who will become the party nominees for the seat of retiring Democratic Sen. Debbie Stabenow?
item.dc:creator: Rick Pluta

item.title: Politics chat: Harris campaign ramps up, Trump campaign refocuses its attention
item.description: The Harris campaign moves into high gear as the Trump campaign redirects its focus, and tries out some new messaging.
item.content:encoded: The Harris campaign moves into high gear as the Trump campaign redirects its focus, and tries out some new messaging.
item.dc:creator: Debbie Elliott

item.title: Pete Buttigieg speaks on the ongoing impact of the Crowdstrike outage on airlines
item.description: NPR's Debbie Elliott speaks with U.S. Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg about recent flight cancellations due to the Crowdstrike tech outage.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Debbie Elliott speaks with U.S. Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg about recent flight cancellations due to the Crowdstrike tech outage.
item.dc:creator: Debbie Elliott

item.title: Companies' quarterly earnings reports hint at possible relief from high prices
item.description: Some big brands reported quarterly earnings in recent days: What do they have to say about consumer spending and the direction of the economy?
item.content:encoded: Some big brands reported quarterly earnings in recent days: What do they have to say about consumer spending and the direction of the economy?
item.dc:creator: Alina Selyukh

item.title: Harris says her mother has been her biggest influence. Who was Shyamala Gopalan?
item.description: Vice President Harris' late mother set an example: we learn what Harris has said about the woman who most profoundly influenced her life.
item.content:encoded: Vice President Harris' late mother set an example: we learn what Harris has said about the woman who most profoundly influenced her life.
item.dc:creator: Deepa Shivaram

item.title: The week in political news, from the newsmakers themselves
item.description: The election landscape shifts again: We hear politicians from the past week, in their own words.
item.content:encoded: The election landscape shifts again: We hear politicians from the past week, in their own words.
item.dc:creator: Debbie Elliott
